properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_TYPE=1

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER=USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE=1 AND B.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
